name: Five nights at Duo
description:
"Looks like you missed your spanish lesson. You know what happens now!"

When that broadcast arrives to your computer you start to get nervous. What are you going to do now? You have to finish your spanish lesson at night(you know, your parents don't let you be with the computer), while Duo is trying to kill you. If you can finish the lesson, Duo will get out of your house. Until the next night arrives...
